title: Amphibians: frogs, toads and salamanders. - Rev. ed.
creator_credit: BFA Educational Media and Paul Burnford
brief_description: Uses excellent close-up photos and cinematography to show a typical amphibian life-cycle and to study the differences between three kinds of amphibians - frogs, toads and salamanders. Suitable for upper secondary level.
